# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## Version 0.2.0 - 2023-03-06

### Features

- `Sound` components can now get audio from either buffers or generators.

### Miscellaneous Tasks

- Update to Bevy 0.10.

## Version 0.1.0 - 2022-12-17

### Miscellaneous Tasks

- Initial release.
